Name: Battle Imagine - Boarrier Tyrant
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Boarrier Tyrant's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Boar Rush.

Stunt! Boar Rush
Summon Elite: Boarrier Tyrant and charges forward with tusks for 3s. Deals Attack Damage and knocks enemies airborne during the charge. Tusks rend the targets, inflicting Wound.
Upon the skill cast, the DMG dealt and healing of your Special Attack are increased for a period.
Wound: Healing received decreases by 50% for 10s.

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
